sentences.en: ASK someone to name a famous psychologist, and chances are they will pick Sigmund Freud (pictured), the bearded Austrian academic who came up with the idea of psychoanalysis.
sentences.cn: 说起著名的心理学家，人们可能会想到西格蒙德弗洛伊德（如图），这位满脸大胡子的奥地利学者提出了精神分析的概念。

sentences.en: Cognitive therapy approach focus on more present psychological condition of patients than Freudian psychoanalysis.
sentences.cn: 心理疗法比弗洛伊德疗法更注重病人的心理条件.

sentences.en: Cognitive therapy approach is more effective than Freudian psychoanalysis in analyzing patients'symptoms.
sentences.cn: 认知疗法在分析病人症状方面要比弗洛伊德心理分析更加有效.

sentences.en: For the woman, her love can turn a frog into a beautiful man, while for the man love reduces the woman to what psychoanalysis calls a "partial object", that in you which makes me desire you.
sentences.cn: 对女人而言，她的爱可以让一只青蛙变成一位英俊的男性，而对男人来说，他的爱则把女人降低为了精神分析所谓的“部分客体”，在你身上使我欲望你的东西。

sentences.en: Freud is the inventor of psychoanalysis.
sentences.cn: 弗洛伊德是精神分析学说的创立者.

sentences.en: Freudian psychoanalysis explained his trouble as Oedipus complex.
sentences.cn: 弗洛伊德精神分析学将他的困扰解释为恋母情节.

sentences.en: Harry's bellowing cod - psychoanalysis of Voldemort is jarringly awful.
sentences.cn: 比方哈利对着伏地魔不知好歹地咆哮那一幕,很是刺耳,相当糟糕.
他的医生建议他做心理分析.

sentences.en: I found myself in the psychoanalysis racket.
sentences.cn: 我发觉自己适于做精神分析行当.

sentences.en: In addition, the practice traits of psychoanalysis make verifying empirical evidence difficult.
sentences.cn: 同时, 由于精神分析的实践知识属性,也让实证检证工作格外困难.

sentences.en: In desperation the army turned to the new ideas of psychoanalysis.
sentences.cn: 绝望中,军队转向心理学家的新想法.

sentences.en: In theory, psychoanalysis is the philosophy of the unconscious mind; in practice it is a means by which mental disorders can be cured.
sentences.cn: 在理论上，精神分析是一门关于无意识心理的哲学；在实践上，它又是一种治愈心理紊乱的方法。

sentences.en: Psychoanalysis is a method of therapy.
sentences.cn: 精神分析是一种治疗方法.

sentences.en: The Oedipus Complex is a branch of psychoanalysis.
sentences.cn: 恋母情节是精神分析学的分支.

sentences.en: The subsequent discussion will be focused on this hidden trend in psychoanalysis.
sentences.cn: 下面将集中讨论精神分析方面的这股暗流.

sentences.en: They are committed, not just to psychology general, but to Freudian psychoanalysis.
sentences.cn: 他们通常不只局限于心理学, 而是要使用弗洛伊德的心理分析.

sentences.en: We esteem Sigmund Freud as the father of psychoanalysis.
sentences.cn: 我们把西格蒙德·弗罗伊德看做精神分析学之父.

sentences.en: WE SHOULD congratulate the Science Museum for setting up an exhibition on psychoanalysis.
sentences.cn: 我们应该庆贺科学博物馆成立一个关于精神分析的展览。

sentences.en: Who has the psychoanalysis case of human relation obstacle?
sentences.cn: 谁有人际关系障碍的精神分析案例?

words.tran_cn: 精神病学的；精神病治疗的
精神病治疗的；精神病学的
精神的；心灵的；灵魂的；超自然的
影响心理状态的；作用于精神的
精神分析的；心理分析的
心理的；心理学的；精神上的
精神病学家，精神病医生
精神病学；精神病治疗法
心理分析，精神分析；精神病患者
精神分析学家；心理分析学家
[心理] 心理发生；精神发生
用精神分析疗法治疗分析

trans.tran_en: medical treatment that involves talking to someone about their life, feelings etc in order to find out the hidden causes of their problems
